alert.note: Alert for Santa Clarita Valley; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued December 27 at 10:05AM PST until December 28 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures between 28 and 32 degrees possible. Coldest in the Ojai Valley and near Malibu Canyon. * WHERE...Ventura County Interior Valleys, Ventura County Coastal Valleys and Santa Clarita Valley. * WHEN...From late tonight through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: Santa Clarita Valley; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys
